other_tests.findings: Positive in 50% of cases tested (only in the index cases), with results of 19% discharge for AII-1 and 38% discharge for BII-1.
Showed enlarged vestibular aqueducts (EVA) in all affected individuals examined; Mondini cochlea was present only in family II.
Identified four mutations, three of which were novel: S398del in exon 10, IVS8â€“2A3G in intron 8, and IVS13/H110019C3G in intron 13. The H723R mutation was also found.
